mapper.sql: id, patientCode, XT, XM, XJ, QD, QC, KS, WHZL, PJFL, ZH, DH, WXFR, LMGS, TY, JW, TH, SM, JZYN, LZ, TX, YY, SYBZ, FZ, AP, AQ, EXOT, BT, BM, YQSR, YNPD, ZTMM, ZTPT, PXYX, PFCC, XTFP, BAIT, HT, TZDX, PMT, YBYW, KBDY, KD, KK, KT, KX, KNN, WGXW, PBWL, XBDH, XBQC, YLBJ, WFYL, TZCZ
mapper.update:
UPDATE df_specimen_admission_diagnosis
patientCode = #{map.patientCode},
XT = #{map.xT},
XM = #{map.xM},

QC = #{map.qC},
KS = #{map.kS},

WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM df_specimen_admission_diagnosis
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND patientCode like CONCAT('%', #{patientCode} , '%')
AND XT like CONCAT('%', #{xT} , '%')
AND XM like CONCAT('%', #{xM} , '%')
AND XJ like CONCAT('%', #{xJ} , '%')
AND QD like CONCAT('%', #{qD} , '%')
AND QC like CONCAT('%', #{qC} , '%')
AND KS like CONCAT('%', #{kS} , '%')
AND WHZL like CONCAT('%', #{wHZL} , '%')
AND PJFL like CONCAT('%', #{pJFL} , '%')
AND ZH like CONCAT('%', #{zH} , '%')
AND DH like CONCAT('%', #{dH} , '%')
AND WXFR like CONCAT('%', #{wXFR} , '%')
AND LMGS like CONCAT('%', #{lMGS} , '%')
AND TY like CONCAT('%', #{tY} , '%')
AND JW like CONCAT('%', #{jW} , '%')
AND TH like CONCAT('%', #{tH} , '%')
AND SM like CONCAT('%', #{sM} , '%')
AND JZYN like CONCAT('%', #{jZYN} , '%')
AND LZ like CONCAT('%', #{lZ} , '%')
AND TX like CONCAT('%', #{tX} , '%')
AND YY like CONCAT('%', #{yY} , '%')
AND SYBZ like CONCAT('%', #{sYBZ} , '%')
AND FZ like CONCAT('%', #{fZ} , '%')
AND AP like CONCAT('%', #{aP} , '%')
AND AQ like CONCAT('%', #{aQ} , '%')
AND EXOT like CONCAT('%', #{eXOT} , '%')
AND BT like CONCAT('%', #{bT} , '%')
AND BM like CONCAT('%', #{bM} , '%')
AND YQSR like CONCAT('%', #{yQSR} , '%')
AND YNPD like CONCAT('%', #{yNPD} , '%')
AND ZTMM like CONCAT('%', #{zTMM} , '%')
AND ZTPT like CONCAT('%', #{zTPT} , '%')
AND PXYX like CONCAT('%', #{pXYX} , '%')
AND PFCC like CONCAT('%', #{pFCC} , '%')
AND XTFP like CONCAT('%', #{xTFP} , '%')
AND BAIT like CONCAT('%', #{bAIT} , '%')
AND HT like CONCAT('%', #{hT} , '%')
AND TZDX like CONCAT('%', #{tZDX} , '%')
AND PMT like CONCAT('%', #{pMT} , '%')
AND YBYW like CONCAT('%', #{yBYW} , '%')
AND KBDY like CONCAT('%', #{kBDY} , '%')
AND KD like CONCAT('%', #{kD} , '%')
AND KK like CONCAT('%', #{kK} , '%')
AND KT like CONCAT('%', #{kT} , '%')
AND KX like CONCAT('%', #{kX} , '%')
AND KNN like CONCAT('%', #{kNN} , '%')
AND WGXW like CONCAT('%', #{wGXW} , '%')
AND PBWL like CONCAT('%', #{pBWL} , '%')
AND XBDH like CONCAT('%', #{xBDH} , '%')
AND XBQC like CONCAT('%', #{xBQC} , '%')
AND YLBJ like CONCAT('%', #{yLBJ} , '%')
AND WFYL like CONCAT('%', #{wFYL} , '%')
AND TZCZ like CONCAT('%', #{tZCZ} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
